mapper.sql: id, title,content, keywords, description, status,is_deleted, create_time, modified_time
mapper.select:
select
FROM notice order by create_time desc
mapper.insert:
insert into notice
id,
title,
keywords,
description,
status,
is_deleted,
create_time,
modified_time,
content,

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update notice
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update notice set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
